channel.title: Please Help out a Noob ?!?
channel.description:
Well today i wanted to use a pirvate server so i downloaded MoparScape 3.0 and just typed in any name and pass in the login screen. but there were no people there.. :confused:
I want to join someones server like that RealScape where there are alot of people and you can spawn a lot of items. I really want to join it so i put in the I.P. address on the top and loged in with a random name and pass but it says error connecting or soemthing server must be down. But even when the server is online it does it for EVERY server, no matter what I.P. i put in there it always says that. Please help I realy realy want to join your community, if you realy would like to help me my msn is : Luisma37@Hotmail.com or you can post here or pm me..
Thanx

item.title: Please Help out a Noob ?!?
item.dc:creator: @Torque Torque
item.description:
@Torque wrote:

What about that RealScape one where it says no Hamachi needed, if i dowload hamachi wont in be able to go into that server at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help out a Noob ?!?
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

U may need hamachi

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help out a Noob ?!?
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

download hamachi at hamachi.cc then join some peoples networks (just search hamachi on this fourm and click some links and join there network)

theres alot of good servers on hamachi…

also merlinscape.servegame.com is pretty good, check it out, and my server is zezimascape.servegame.com, check that out too.

if you dont know how to type in a server, click file in the upper left hand corner, then click new server. then you can type in merlinscape, or mine (zezimascape) or check out rs2 advertisement for other non hamachi servers.

good luck, and have fun

-ipk

Read full topic
